VARIABLES.name: y_a1
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using A1 equipment

VARIABLES.name: y_a2
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using A2 equipment

VARIABLES.name: y_b1
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using B1 equipment

VARIABLES.name: y_b2
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using B2 equipment

VARIABLES.name: y_b3
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using B3 equipment

OBJECTIVE.query: p_i*x_i + p_ii*x_ii + p_iii*x_iii - r_i*x_i - r_ii*x_ii - r_iii*x_iii
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max Z = p_i x_i + p_ii x_ii + p_iii x_iii - r_i x_i - r_ii x_ii - r_iii x_iii

CONSTRAINTS.description: The total production of Product I, II, and III can not exceed 1,509.
The total production of Product I can not exceed 1,200.
The total production of Product I and III can not exceed 1,510.
The total production of Product II can not exceed 800.

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_i + y_a1 * u_a1 + y_a2 * u_a2 <= c_a1 * y_a1 + c_a2 * y_a2
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_i + y_a1 u_a1 + y_a2 u_a2 \le c_a1 y_a1 + c_a2 y_a2
CONSTRAINTS.description: Ensure that the total production of Product I is within the constraints defined by A1 and A2 equipment capacities.

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_ii + y_b1 * u_b1 + y_b2 * u_b2 + y_b3 * u_b3 <= c_b1 * y_b1 + c_b2 * y_b2 + c_b3 * y_b3
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_ii + y_b1 u_b1 + y_b2 u_b2 + y_b3 u_b3 \le c_b1 y_b1 + c_b2 y_b2 + c_b3 y_b3
CONSTRAINTS.description: Ensure that the total production of Product II is within the constraints defined by B1, B2, and B3 equipment capacities.

CONSTRAINTS.query: x_iii + y_a2 * u_a2 + y_b2 * u_b2 <= c_a2 * y_a2 + c_b2 * y_b2
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_iii + y_a2 u_a2 + y_b2 u_b2 \le c_a2 y_a2 + c_b2 y_b2
CONSTRAINTS.description: Ensure that the total production of Product III is within the constraints defined by A2 and B2 equipment capacities.
